channel.title: Need QUICK PORT HELP!
channel.description:
Ok, in my runserver file it has:
[code] @echo off color 0a title Gazscape V3 java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server [/code]
What would I add to get it to run on port 5555 instead of port 43594?
-Gaz

item.title: Need QUICK PORT HELP!
item.dc:creator: @gazer11 gazer11
item.description:
@gazer11 wrote:

I’ve done the same thing with portforwarding as I did with the other port…

-Gaz

item.title: Need QUICK PORT HELP!
item.dc:creator: @gazer11 gazer11
item.description:
@gazer11 wrote:

Ok, in my runserver file it has:

@echo off
color 0a
title Gazscape V3
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

What would I add to get it to run on port 5555 instead of port 43594?

-Gaz
